 </head>
 <body>
  <header class="header" id="header">
   <div class="header__inner standard-container">

     <div class="carousel-banner__video">
      <video aria-hidden="true" id="video-{DDDEF639-41AC-4A3D-97E9-29B20F010194}" loop="" muted="">

       </source>
      </video>
     </div>
     <div class="standard-container carousel-banner__container" style="opacity:0">
      <div class="carousel-banner__link">
       <p class="carousel-banner__tagline">
        We are CSIRO
       </p>
       <h2 class="carousel-banner__title carousel-banner__text">
        Your national science agency
       </h2>
       <p class="carousel-banner__text">
        As Australia's national science agency and innovation catalyst, we solve the greatest challenges through innovative science and technology.
       </p>
       <a class="btn btn--primary btn--arrow" href="/en/about/We-are-CSIRO">
        Our purpose
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-hidden="true" class="carousel-banner__item" data-order="0" id="{4BBF3F7E-88BA-4903-930F-AA30B276C33F}" style="visibility:hidden;background-image: url('/-/media/News-releases/2020/Ship-cladding-CBG/CBG-Systems-Hobart-0878.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=A33B42697D1DCECD26080D148F60F443')">
     <div class="standard-container carousel-banner__container" style="opacity:0">
      <div class="carousel-banner__link">
       <p class="carousel-banner__tagline">
        latest news
       </p>
       <h2 class="carousel-banner__title carousel-banner__text">
        Modern Manufacturing
       </h2>
       <p class="carousel-banner__text">
        Our researchers combine scientific rigour with real world, industrial know-how. We partner with industry to develop innovative products and processes that allow Australian manufacturers to be globally competitive and environmentally sustainable.
       </p>
       <a class="btn btn--primary btn--arrow" href="/en/work-with-us/industries/manufacturing">
        Work with us
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-hidden="true" class="carousel-banner__item" data-order="0" id="{0EAD13E4-0FD2-4916-A047-B6D525446C5E}" style="visibility:hidden;background-image: url('/-/media/News-releases/2020/Coronavirus/Computer-artwork-coronavirus-associated.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=5C3D8B8A06A1C6963BD17929AA92C47E')">
     <div class="standard-container carousel-banner__container" style="opacity:0">
      <div class="carousel-banner__link">
       <p class="carousel-banner__tagline">
        Safeguarding Australia and the world
       </p>
       <h2 class="carousel-banner__title carousel-banner__text">
        COVID-19 research
       </h2>
       <p class="carousel-banner__text">
        We are involved in key research for the rapid global response to the COVID-19 outbreak
       </p>
       <a class="btn btn--primary btn--arrow" href="/en/research/health-medical/diseases/COVID-19-research">
        Our fight against coronavirus
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div aria-hidden="true" class="carousel-banner__item" data-order="0" id="{7A678110-1AFB-4320-9078-9FC8F2995627}" style="visibility:hidden;background-image: url('/-/media/Education-media/Images/Young-Indigenous-Womens-STEM-Academy/young-indigenous-womens-stem-academy-branding.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=1B21A8933A35AEB3F1988CAF939A5B82')">

     <div class="standard-container carousel-banner__container" style="opacity:0">
      <div class="carousel-banner__link">
       <p class="carousel-banner__tagline">
       </p>
       <h2 class="carousel-banner__title carousel-banner__text">
        Acknowledgement of Country
       </h2>
       <p class="carousel-banner__text">
        CSIRO acknowledges the Traditional Owners of the lands, seas and waters, of the area that we live and work on across Australia and pays its respect to Elders past and present. We recognise that Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples have made, and will continue to make, extraordinary contributions to Australian life including in cultural, economic and scientific domains.
       </p>
       <a class="btn btn--primary btn--arrow" href="/en/research/indigenous-science">
        Indigenous science projects
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

   <div class="page__section standard-container">
    <h2>
     Solving the greatest challenges
    </h2>
    <div class="grid grid--3">
     <div class="grid__item">
      <a class="card has-arrow" href="/en/about/challenges-missions">
       <div class="card__image">
        <div class="card__image__inner" style="background-image: url(/-/media/Showcases/Missions/missions-associated.jpg?mw=500&amp;hash=ADD6E6FCB1107C13209287A4CA351E66)">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content">
        <h3 class="card__title has-arrow__text">
         <span class="has-arrow__inner">
          Challenges and missions
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="card__summary">
         Our purpose as Australia's national science agency is to solve Australia's greatest challenges through innovative science and technology â€“ it's what we've been doing for the past 100 years.
        </p>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="grid__item">
      <a class="card has-arrow" href="/en/work-with-us/services/consultancy-strategic-advice-services/CSIRO-futures/Futures-reports/COVID-19-recovery-resilience">
       <div class="card__image">
        <div class="card__image__inner" style="background-image: url(/-/media/Do-Business/Images/Futures/COVID-19-Recovery-resilience-tile.jpg?mw=500&amp;hash=3EF1F8CC03FC58C422A2FAFAFFCB4E39)">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content">
        <h3 class="card__title has-arrow__text">
         <span class="has-arrow__inner">
          COVID-19: Recovery and resilience
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="card__summary">
         Our industries face unprecedented challenges due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Harnessing science and technology now can help create a brighter future for Australia.
        </p>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="grid__item">
      <a class="card has-arrow" href="/en/research/natural-disasters/bushfires">
       <div class="card__image">
        <div class="card__image__inner" style="background-image: url(/-/media/LWF/Images/Landscape-intensification/143---Copy.jpg?mw=500&amp;hash=78A2E06211D0A48C7F0115C6E4B0C841)">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="card__content">
        <h3 class="card__title has-arrow__text">
         <span class="has-arrow__inner">
          Bushfires
         </span>
        </h3>
        <p class="card__summary">
         We've provided climate and disaster resilience science and guidance to governments, agencies, industries and communities since 1944.
        </p>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="page__section">
    <div class="carousel" id="carousel-{BE099C5B-B6EC-4DAD-A801-350592DAEE5C}">
     <div class="carousel__controls">
      <h2>
       Our greatest inventions
      </h2>
      <ul class="carousel__list" role="tablist">
       <li>
        <button aria-controls="carouselitem-{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" aria-selected="false" class="reversed carousel__link" data-id="{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" id="control-{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" role="tab">
         Fast Wifi
        </button>
       </li>
       <li>
        <button aria-controls="carouselitem-{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" aria-selected="false" class="reversed carousel__link" data-id="{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" id="control-{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" role="tab">
         Aerogard
        </button>
       </li>
       <li>
        <button aria-controls="carouselitem-{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" aria-selected="false" class="reversed carousel__link" data-id="{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" id="control-{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" role="tab">
         Hendra vaccine
        </button>
       </li>
       <li>
        <button aria-controls="carouselitem-{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" aria-selected="false" class="reversed carousel__link" data-id="{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" id="control-{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" role="tab">
         Plastic banknotes
        </button>
       </li>
       <li>
        <button aria-controls="carouselitem-{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" aria-selected="false" class="reversed carousel__link" data-id="{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" id="control-{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" role="tab">
         Raft Polymerisation
        </button>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
     <div class="carousel__content">
      <div class="carousel__slides">
       <p class="carouselliveregion sr-only" role="alert">
       </p>
       <a aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="control-{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" class="carousel__item has-arrow" data-id="{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" href="/en/research/technology-space/it/WLAN" id="carouselitem-{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}">
        <div class="carousel__image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/100YearsOfInnovation/Wifi_smaller.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=9C7227E4B04B13DDD2F24046F6225E3D)">
        </div>
        <div class="carousel__text">
         <h3 class="carousel__title has-arrow__text">
          <span class="has-arrow__inner">
           Fast Wifi
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          Our wireless invention lies at the heart of what is now the most popular way to connect computers without wires. It is used in offices, public buildings, homes and coffee shops - often called 'WiFi Hotspots'. The invention came out of our pioneering work in radioastronomy.
         </p>
         <p class="btn btn--primary">
          Where did wifi come from?
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
       <a aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="control-{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" class="carousel__item has-arrow" data-id="{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" href="/en/about/achievements/Top-10" id="carouselitem-{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}">
        <div class="carousel__image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/100YearsOfInnovation/image--aerogard_smaller.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=A962DFFACB4AB1314AAF812CCA7FCBB6)">
        </div>
        <div class="carousel__text">
         <h3 class="carousel__title has-arrow__text">
          <span class="has-arrow__inner">
           Aerogard
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          Insect repellent Aerogard has been keeping flying pests at bay since the 1960s. Flies, mosquitoes and other winged insects are not just irritating, they can carry diseases and infect both animals and humans. In 1938, our scientist Doug Waterhouse was working on a repellent to tackle the sheep blowfly, but with the arrival of World War II, he turned his attention to protecting allied troops from mosquitoes.
         </p>
         <p class="btn btn--primary">
          Itching to learn more
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
       <a aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="control-{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" class="carousel__item has-arrow" data-id="{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" href="/en/research/animals/livestock/Hendra" id="carouselitem-{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}">
        <div class="carousel__image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/Showcases/AAHL/Bat-cells-Hendra-infected_crppedtorectangle.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=074159591BC49A320D56B5AB75E07ADC)">
        </div>
        <div class="carousel__text">
         <h3 class="carousel__title has-arrow__text">
          <span class="has-arrow__inner">
           World's first Hendra vaccine
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          In 1994, a deadly new virus threatened to stop Australia's premier horse race â€“ the Melbourne Cup. Over the next 16 years, 18 outbreaks of the now infamous Hendra virus were recorded through Queensland and NSW. In May 2011 CSIRO announced the development of a prototype vaccine for horses. By March 2013 our scientists confirmed that horses were immune to a lethal exposure of the Hendra virus six months post vaccination.
         </p>
         <p class="btn btn--primary">
          How it happened
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
       <a aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="control-{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" class="carousel__item has-arrow" data-id="{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" href="/en/about/achievements/Top-10" id="carouselitem-{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}">
        <div class="carousel__image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/100YearsOfInnovation/Images/image--banknotes.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=11A6398D356B49E413D55EC64FBB329D)">
        </div>
        <div class="carousel__text">
         <h3 class="carousel__title has-arrow__text">
          <span class="has-arrow__inner">
           Plastic banknotes
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          Australia's introduction of plastic bank notes with optically variable devices (OVDs), developed by CSIRO, was a world's first and represented a paradigm shift towards a currency secure against forgery. This was one of our longest  and most successful research initiatives.
         </p>
         <p class="btn btn--primary">
          Learn more about our inventions
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
       <a aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="control-{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" class="carousel__item has-arrow" data-id="{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" href="/en/research/production/materials/RAFT" id="carouselitem-{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}">
        <div class="carousel__image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/MF/Images/RAFT_main.jpg?mw=2000&amp;hash=7C724083E22FD242E61127AD1B583F55)">
        </div>
        <div class="carousel__text">
         <h3 class="carousel__title has-arrow__text">
          <span class="has-arrow__inner">
           RAFT polymerisation
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          RAFT polymerisation is a new technique for creating plastics that allows a higher degree of control over the way molecules link together. Plastics are essential elements of modern life, created through the process of polymerisation to give them a range of different attributes.
         </p>
         <p class="btn btn--primary">
          Learn more
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="carousel__inline-controls">
       <ul class="list--inline carousel__indicator-list">
        <li>
         <button aria-label="Jump to slide: Fast Wifi (slide number 0)" class="carousel__indicator carousel__slide-indicator" data-id="{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}" id="indicator-{A029811D-8A39-421A-AA94-477B5B51CFD8}">
         </button>
        </li>
        <li>
         <button aria-label="Jump to slide: Aerogard (slide number 1)" class="carousel__indicator carousel__slide-indicator" data-id="{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}" id="indicator-{6442CD1E-FB68-4974-80C1-E35DBF44E056}">
         </button>
        </li>
        <li>
         <button aria-label="Jump to slide: World's first Hendra vaccine (slide number 2)" class="carousel__indicator carousel__slide-indicator" data-id="{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}" id="indicator-{52C85F64-E857-42B1-A174-8147378952F6}">
         </button>
        </li>
        <li>
         <button aria-label="Jump to slide: Plastic banknotes (slide number 3)" class="carousel__indicator carousel__slide-indicator" data-id="{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}" id="indicator-{5EF16B00-9F34-4E25-91F8-5CB0B12E6883}">
         </button>
        </li>
        <li>
         <button aria-label="Jump to slide: RAFT polymerisation (slide number 4)" class="carousel__indicator carousel__slide-indicator" data-id="{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}" id="indicator-{0E36714A-2ED5-4644-B560-E2D2DB2026E7}">
         </button>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <button aria-label="Move carousel backwards" class="btn btn--white carousel-control__btn" data-carousel="carousel-{BE099C5B-B6EC-4DAD-A801-350592DAEE5C}" data-direction="backwards">
        <svg class="icon arrow">
         <use xlink:href="#arrow">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </button>
       <button aria-label="Move carousel forwards" class="btn btn--white carousel-control__btn" data-carousel="carousel-{BE099C5B-B6EC-4DAD-A801-350592DAEE5C}" data-direction="forwards">
        <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon arrow">
         <use xlink:href="#arrow">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </button>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

      </h2>

       <div class="grid__item">
        <div class="small-container">
         <h2 class="h3">
          At CSIRO, we solve the greatest challenges through innovative science and technology.
         </h2>
        </div>
